website_summaries.verdict: It’s a little pricey, but you’ll receive a full HD resolution touchscreen in this 2-in-1 netbook.
pros: Slim, lightweight design makes it easy to carry for the entire day
Screen detaches to serve as a tablet whenever desired
cons: Customers have experienced occasional keyboard problems

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet/Laptop hybrid
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace my old laptop that started to lag so slowly and had an almost completely dry battery. The windows tablet has been nothing short of amazing so far. Have the option to use it as a tablet but laptop is my main use. Keyboard is nice as well and loads everything exceptionally fast
customer_reviews.author: Kin B

customer_reviews.title: working great so far
customer_reviews.text: 2 in 1 design, it’s both a laptop and a tablet. You can touch the screen to use it or use keyboard. Specially it is lightweight, very convenient to take out for work or play games. And the picture is clear and delicate, the color saturation is high , it can give you a more comfortable visual enjoyments. 2 in 1 tablet with keyboard, you can turn it into a laptop right away.
customer_reviews.author: king

customer_reviews.title: Great product. But...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Absolutely no complaints. Except...the blue light on the left side stays on at all times. It drains the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap machine
customer_reviews.text: Had it up an running in no time. Outside paint skuffs to easy and screen needs a protective cover. Batter life is about what the company claims. I love this unit I put a corner one it and a case. I don't use the keyboard too much. I think I'll install a carbon fiber final cover just so it won't skuff so easy. I still love. It runs power point quick and snappy.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was a little awkward to set up, some little glitch my husband had to work through but now it works great. I love it. The only negative is that the touch screen, when attached to the keyboard is heavy and if open more than 90° it will try to fall over. I have to put something behind to prevent this. A little kickstand in the back would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TeamRice

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Using to run Sim Innovation Air Manager. It runs a complex instrument screens at 59 fps. I was quite supriced at the frame rate. The screen is very clear and bright. Not a very fast machine but runs Win 10 very well. The trackpad is a bit touchy and too small to be really useful, the keyboard is quite good and feels nice. Works great with a mouse. It has a nice robust feel, screen only opens to about 90 degrees, more would have been nice. Battery life is just a couple hrs, but the price is very low, got it for $209, quite a deal.
customer_reviews.author: olof ekbergh

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to work with keyboard!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for few months. The screen is clear and smooth. The speed of app opening and running is very fast because of the 6G. The storage is 128G which would be enough for me to save lots of photos and apps. I play some games with 4-5G. The process is faster than I expected. There is no crash most time. I just encounter one or twice. I'm really glad that the keyboard is also included. It's convenient for me to work like using laptop. I think I need to find a cover for it to prevent scratch and drop.
customer_reviews.author: leon

customer_reviews.title: It's nice when something works as it should
customer_reviews.text: I'm strictly using this tablet for car audio tuning using W10 compatible software. This tablet runs the software efficiently, and the battery life is way better than a full size W10 laptop that I was using. I always hesitate writing positive reviews within days of receiving the item, but so far so good...
customer_reviews.author: TheDynoGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for casual web browsing and video streaming
customer_reviews.text: I got this EZpad for almost a month now and I like it. (Disclaimer: I use it for web browsing and video streaming mainly) it’s very light weight and performance is good. The only bad thing I encountered was that the windows update function was set to be off for some reason and I have to go online and troubleshoot myself. Not a big deal if you know windows good enough. One suggestion is to get the micro HDMI connector if you plan to hook it that to a bigger screen.
customer_reviews.author: Wing K.

customer_reviews.title: great computer
customer_reviews.text: It works great as a tablet or laptop. for the size and money, it is the perfect computer. It has a handy USB-C and 128 gig hard drive' I love it
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne

customer_reviews.title: Durable and efficient .....
customer_reviews.text: I loved them. We are using them in our store and they are amazing. They have a lot of storage and are being used at the front desk for our PO system.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Love it. No complaints so far. Tablet works great and does the job that I need it too.
customer_reviews.author: sherry farris

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For around 250 this tablet pc is very well worth it. I purchased it specially to tune my car but found that it is good office work as well. Out of curiosity I installed steam and this thing can actually run older games pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Ding Dansen

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: It came speaking Chinese and would not stop. As soon as I turned it on, it starting talking and would not stop. All in Chinese. The language was set to Chinese and all the menus were in Chinese. There were no Latin characters to pick English as a language. This should not be sold in the U.S.
customer_reviews.author: Renzi

customer_reviews.title: works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I've had very few issues with this device, running the latest upcoming Windows 10 release it just flies, I use it for work mainly, so aside from having to tweak a few things here and there for performance boosts its a pretty decent machine for the price, and yes the keyboard is a must. Update: after over a month of use I noticed the keyboard doesn't lock on one side of the tablet (it always winds up uneven), other than that minor issue the product is still working well for what its intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Addison Micheal

customer_reviews.title: E3950 CPU & 120GB M.2 SSD
customer_reviews.text: Actually comes with E3950 processor (better than N3450 but uses 2x power, Intel HD 505 vs HD 500). Actually comes with 120GB Hoodisk M. 2 SSD. Quality is OK, it's Chinese. Bought it for car logging, tuning & Netflix. Change power settings to max performance while plugged in. It's alot faster than expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: alex rybaltovsky

customer_reviews.title: Short Lived Laptop
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was very excited to receive this lap top as it was small and met her needs for Jr. High. Unfortunately after 6 months it stopped taking a charge and would no longer turn on. After visiting numerous sites I found that this was very common and that a quick fix was not available. Just about every site said you would have to short out the battery, which is very dangerous, and reset a software setting. If you have to buy this be sure to get Amazons extended warranty because you will need it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Garza

customer_reviews.title: Not good choice!
customer_reviews.text: Intended to use this small laptop for reading online books only. Very simple task. Not even that was simple due computer constant malfunctions. Screen section doesn't plug properly in keyboard part and makes sounds, suddenly decides to shut off for no reason, if you left it in sleep mode, one time it will wake, while next time acts like dead possum and you have to force it with start up button on. I liked size of, it is almost as tablet, price not bad, but now I regret not buying more expensive and reliable machine from known manufacturer. My first Windows based comp and very upset.
customer_reviews.author: Sasa Jovicevic

customer_reviews.title: Beware...
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is an okay tablet. But, here's the warning; if you will be doing PowerPoint presentations, I would stay away from this one. Every time the tablet advances a slide or if there is an animation within the slide, you can expect a noticeable hum until the animation is complete. Very distracting. I've used other tablets for this exact application and did not experience the hum. I'm not an expert, but guessing the sound jack is too close or not shielded well enough from the tablet's processor. Beware...
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: On the computer all day at work. Just need one at home for internet and occasional shopping. This tablet is perfect for the cost. Use to have a surface so the connection of the screen and keyboard not fitting well is a little disturbing, but for the money and what I need, it does the trick. UPDATE: the replacement worked a couple of times and died as well. Not worth the trouble
customer_reviews.author: jean o.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a kid maybe...
customer_reviews.text: You can not do any type of work on this. It feels like a knockoff of a real computer. I wanted it to work but I see now why when you check reviews online it’s rated so poorly. I sat here today and the mouse didn’t work, then it just started making a noise like I was unplugging USB’s constantly. So I realized what am I doing, for $100 more I could get a real laptop. I wish they made a little better product and this would of been ok.
customer_reviews.author: Big Wes

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This windows tablet is great for this price which is just under $300, I have been using for browsing websites and videos, everything is smooth, the system is fast. Saving $$$ on a tablet, great BUY, :)
customer_reviews.author: Den Lin

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I only have a couple of compliments, but they're big ones. The wifi is absolute garbage. I'm constantly getting disconnected from wifi and when I am connected it's very slow. Like, almost can't youtube slow. If all you're after is a word processor it'll do the trick, but if you want to do *anything* else on it all I can say is good luck. I've been waiting 5 minutes just for Gmail to load.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Weimer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little tablet windows computer
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's pretty good laptop. Light weight, not too slow for web and word. But after updated windows, a hao123 web redirection occurred. Clean installation with a new m.2 SSD (512GB) was pretty fast. However it was lots of pains to make the touchscreen work properly. Hope it can last for several years.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like it, but couldn't
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it looked like a good deal. The reviews were pretty good, but not many of them, But after my purchase (I bought 2) I was very disappointed. It was slow, the keyboard was poor, the touch screen was not very responsive. The screen's connection to the keyboard had to be repeated adjusted to maintain connection. The cursor would jump round when typing and no adjustment to fix in settings. Screen resolution was not great. I returned them and purchased a different devise.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Y

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I just got a lemon.
customer_reviews.text: The whole thing is a lemon. Bought it a month ago for a class and the keyboard has been a rough project from the start. Slow typing, lag, missed keystrokes. Even typing on touch screen is laggy. Trying to type and essay and it's not letting me type letters. It's as if the whole thing is stuck on control lock. Purchase with a grain of salt and only if you want a throw away tablet to watch videos maybe. Not if you absolutely need it to work. I'm extremely frustrated with it.
customer_reviews.author: Antivia Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Speakers to low/screen turns off
customer_reviews.text: I love my computer but towards the end of my school semister when computer was only 3 months old it would go to a blank screen and then turn off (not good if taking a test or writing a speech). Have to wait a while and then reboot. Also the speakers are horrible. I have to use earbuds/headphones to hear anything. I would not buy again for these 2 reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Smith

customer_reviews.title: The operating system never came on.
customer_reviews.text: The item was light weight and detachable which I was what I needed. However, after plugging it in overnight the operating system never came on. I had to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: drRansom

customer_reviews.title: Mistake!
customer_reviews.text: Screen feels cheap, but everything works great. Bought this for my kindergartener for distance learning. It has a 30 day return window... On day 31 the screen detached and started falling off! I can see and feel adhesive and the circuitry under the screen is visible. The camera is now covered by the screen so it's useless. I have never been so disappointed by any purchase in my life. LEMON! I'll update when customer service gets back to me.
customer_reviews.author: A Browder

customer_reviews.title: Jumper EZpad
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting much from tablet. I was mildly surprised. Quick and quiet. I only gave the touchscreen 4 stars because its TOO touchy and cant find any adjustments. The Touchpad or tablet cannot not be disabled. Otherwise great product. LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Stone

customer_reviews.title: A lot of power at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This device comes with a pretty speedy set of stats and 6GB of RAM, which makes the biggest difference in running Windows + multiple apps. The keyboard is acceptable, the screen is clear. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Abel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT KNOWN IF I LIKE OR HATE THIS LAPTOP.
customer_reviews.text: THE TABLET IS EASY TO USE AND THE BATTERY IS GOOD. VERY HARD TO OPEN AND START. POP UPS IN THE LOWER CORNER IS THE CHITS. CAME WITH ZERO , NONE INSTRIICTIONS CAME WITH PC. THIS IS NOT ACCEPETABLE. STILL NOT SURE IF I LIKE OR NOT.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT

customer_reviews.title: Check if your Windows is activated mine wasn’t....
customer_reviews.text: Personally the laptop works and it’s efficient I have had to issues and major ones.. the first is that I got a special usb hub to connect more devices and hdmi port and for some reason when I plug it in the tablet shuts down... the second and the most important the laptop didn’t come with Windows activated so now I have to spend extra money on a Windows license I cannot return the item because I am not on the states but be careful
customer_reviews.author: Luis G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Computer
customer_reviews.text: Only about 4 days in, but this tablet computer works rather well so far. Screen is responsive, seems to run pretty quick. I'm really only using a web browser and putty, and it's doing very well. Battery life is a little meh, but I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue screen within the first hours of usage.
customer_reviews.text: I got the blue screen ( TWICE) as the picture within the first 5 hours of usage. It seems the computer came with defective hard drive. Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Nidia Bucarelli

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't power on after a month of use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for wife at Xmas. At first it worked great. Now it won't even power on. Very disappointed in product and quality. Cant even get files off that were saved.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff F

customer_reviews.title: wifi says 2.4 & 5 ghz update
customer_reviews.text: will not see 5 ghz networks unless I use an alternate plug in wifi adapter wifi card is not capable of streaming video even when 10 feet from router....
customer_reviews.author: Edward H

customer_reviews.title: Nice tablet to use!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet works just as expected! I was a little bit doubtful about will a $300 tablet (and Windows!) work. When it came in it worked just fine! I had no trouble connecting it to the internet, using the touch screen or download apps. I would recommend it for ppl want a value choice for windows tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Zehan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is really poor quality for this price, I try ho and ibm both are much much big difference than this.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Ho

customer_reviews.title: Overall it’s not a bad device.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the way the keyboard attaches but that’s a personal preference. It doesn’t have very good battery life but it is a decent tablet. But it is definitely not a laptop if that is what your looking for. Shipping was good and no issues with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher G. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Crashed after 6 months cant get intouch with jumper!
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months my laptop has crashed during an update and no get works as a touchscreen laptop. I have tried to contact jumper about the warranty and nobody has responded. I wouldnt recommend this laptop for that reason. Before it crashed on me it was great though.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: DoA... Shell error at startup
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even get to use it. Won't boot up. Has a "map error" and boots to a shell> prompt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Works rather well for the price. Allows me to do all my work on it and my kids play games on it.
customer_reviews.author: penguin56265

customer_reviews.title: Good price/performance ratio
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it's a very good device. The only exceptions are the highly reflective display and the not always working connection between PC and keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Reichel

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard really sucks... If you are looking for a tablet PC, you will be disappointed just like me...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph H. How

customer_reviews.title: Hardware needs improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Needs a sturdier keyboard. As well as a better docking clamps. The design is ok and specs are decent enough to run microaoft office or watch a video. Not both simultaneously.
customer_reviews.author: Saigium

customer_reviews.title: No way to contact seller with warranty issues.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this item 6 months ago with a 1 year warranty and wireless adapter has quit working. No way to contact seller to file warranty or obtain replacement. Decent device with good battery life but pretty useless when you can’t connect to wifi.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila's Shelf

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!! Keyboard doesn't lock!
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard does not stay attached to the screen portion!! It clicks in but doesn't lock ever so you have to hold it in place which makes no sense! Don't waste your money! Go buy another one! Any other one!
customer_reviews.author: Kensington

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging properly after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped charging properly after 6 months. Power cord connection to Ezpad is extremely loose and does not stay in the 5v connection as it should. Am awaiting a response from the company. If it would stay connected then this would be a 4.5 star item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't really done much with it yet. I have set it up, but that's about as much as I have done on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant's

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but.......
customer_reviews.text: the keyboard will stop working for a period of time and the screen freezes
customer_reviews.author: Jeron

customer_reviews.title: Didnt come with stylus
customer_reviews.text: Upset because it didnt come with a stylus that I thought was supposed to come with it. The fact that it is supposed to come with a stylus is one of the main reasons I chose this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Claude

customer_reviews.title: NEED TO SPEAK JAPANESE
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS TABLET UNLESS YOU SPEAK JAPANESE AND WANT TO SPEND MANY MANY HOURS WITH MICROSOFT HELP
customer_reviews.author: Dennis L Thrift

customer_reviews.title: not impressed. very dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: my tablet had a dent in the top of the screen and also runs slow and some parts of the screen don't work well with touch and the docking keyboard is crooked
customer_reviews.author: Suzee milbauer

customer_reviews.title: I wish price was better
customer_reviews.text: Screen scratches easy if you are not careful. Performance is good, ideal for normal home or office tasks.
customer_reviews.author: oscar

customer_reviews.title: Don’t.
customer_reviews.text: This literally worked for a month, and then the internet stopped working, and couldn’t even open settings. You get what you pay for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: 9 months owning and already an issue
customer_reviews.text: The laptop looks like it will power on, but there is no screen display. Save your money and don't buy this one....
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H.

customer_reviews.title: Worm in preinstalled software
customer_reviews.text: There is was a worm installed on the device when it was delivered. Would infect other devices on your network.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S Sims

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: Mostly using this as a tablet for reading but enjoy the pc capabilities. The key board is a great plus for when I’m using it for writing.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Not great!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 days of using it for online school.
customer_reviews.author: michael hall

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn on.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 6 months. Used about 25 times. No response from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: RSC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Not a super-fast computer. It's a tablet, small and compact. But, it supports windows 10 mobile with its internal storage. It is exactly what it claims to be. A middle range tablet with a keyboard. It has a USB slot in both the tablet and the included keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Speedbyrd

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I took the risk And I’m’ very satisfied. fast delivery. Good product. So thank you ! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Ali

product_meta.title: 11.6" Windows 10 Tablet, Jumper EZpad 6 Pro PC Tablet with Keyboard Full HD Touch Screen 2 in 1 Laptop with 6GB RAM 64GB ROM Supports 128GB TF-Card,Removable Keyboard, Mini HD, Bluetooth, USB3.0
feature_bullets: 🌞【6GB DDR3 and 64GB eMMC Flash Memory】—6GB DDR3 Smoothly Run Your Photos and Video-Editing Applications.64GB eMMC Storage Capacity Provides Room to Store Pictures, Videos, Music and More.You Could Enjoy the Pleasure of Program Starting, Web Browsing and Switch on Business Office and Daily Entertainment.

🌞【Removable Keyboard Ultra Slim & Stylish】—The Slim and Snug Fit of Docking Case Converts Your Tablet Into a 2 in 1 Laptop.Computer is Ultra Slim, Absolutely Perfect for Your Daily Requirement! Included at Home,In the Office, the Coffee Shop or On the Move!

🌞【11.6 inch FHD IPS Touchscreen Screen】—Offers 1920 x 1080 Resolution Good Experience for Watching Videos and Browsing the Web. It Allows You to Capture Memorable Moments and Boasts Impressive High-Quality Images.The TouchScreen is Super Convenient for You to Switch Pages Freely.

🌞【Windows 10 Home OS】—Offers More Powerful Performance, Brings You More Smooth and Wonderful User Experience.Powered by Quad-Core Processor 1.6GHz (up to 2.0GHz), Offers You Smooth Operation and Stable Multitasking Experience.

🌞【12 Months Warranty】Jumper is Committed to Notebooks, Laptops and Tablets Research and Production for 23 Years.We Have The Upmost Confidence in Our Product Range of 2 in 1 Laptops and Notebooks. Please Feel Free to Contact Us If You Have Any Questions. And Please Read the User Manual Carefully.
